Package FileManager

Class CsvFileWriter

Object
CsvFileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
dataWriter
public class CsvFileWriter extends Object implements dataWriter
The CsvFileWriter class provides methods to write or modify data in CSV files located within the project structure. It implements the dataWriter interface, enabling the writing of individual cells, appending rows, and updating specific rows.

This class assumes that CSV files are stored under the path "HealthManagementSystem/src/FileManager/Data/" within the project directory.

Example usage: 

 CsvFileWriter csvWriter = new CsvFileWriter();
 csvWriter.writeData("example.csv", 2, 1, "newValue");
 csvWriter.writeRow("example.csv", List.of("new", "data", "row"));
 csvWriter.writeRow("example.csv", 3, List.of("updated", "data", "row"));

Note: Ensure proper file permissions and that the file exists at the specified path.

Since:
2024-11-6

Tan Guang Wei

  • Method Details

    • writeData

      public void writeData(String fileName, int rowIndex, int colIndex, String newData)
      Updates a specific cell in the CSV file with new data.
      Specified by:
      writeData in interface dataWriter
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file to update, located in the specified path.
      rowIndex - The row index of the cell to update, starting from 0.
      colIndex - The column index of the cell to update, starting from 0.
      newData - The new data to write into the specified cell.

      If the specified cell position is out of bounds, no update will be performed.

    • writeRow

      public void writeRow(String fileName, List<String> newData)
      Appends a new row to the end of the CSV file.
      Specified by:
      writeRow in interface dataWriter
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file to update, located in the specified path.
      newData - A list of strings representing the new row data to append.

      Each string in the list represents a cell in the row, separated by commas in the file.

    • writeRow

      public void writeRow(String fileName, int rowIndex, List<String> newData)
      Replaces an existing row in the CSV file with new data.
      Specified by:
      writeRow in interface dataWriter
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file to update, located in the specified path.
      rowIndex - The index of the row to replace, starting from 0.
      newData - A list of strings representing the new data to insert into the specified row.

      If the row index is out of bounds, no update is performed.

    • deleteRow

      public void deleteRow(String fileName, int rowIndex)
      Removes an existing row in the CSV file with new data.
      Specified by:
      deleteRow in interface dataWriter
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the CSV file to update, located in the specified path.
      rowIndex - The index of the row to replace, starting from 0.

      If the row index is out of bounds, no update is performed.
